title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
description: Peter Parker tries to stop Adrian 'The Vulture' Toomes from selling weapons made with advanced Chitauri technology while trying to balance his life as an ordinary high school student.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
description: The world is in danger as four massive elemental creatures -- each representing Earth, air, water and fire -- emerge from a hole torn in the universe.

title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
description: Zack Snyder's Justice League is a 2021 film about a team of metahumans led by Batman and Wonder Woman who must protect the world from a catastrophic threat.

title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
description: Eddie Brock attempts to reignite his career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady, who becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution.

title: Captain America: Civil War
description: Captain America (Chris Evans) believes superheroes should remain free to defend humanity without government interference.

title: Black Panther
description: A black panther is the melanistic colour variant of the leopard (Panthera pardus) and the jaguar (Panthera onca).

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: An endgame is the very last part of a strategic game, like chess or backgammon
